verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> and to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%>
saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The scribes <S%G1122><s%> and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> have seated <S%G2523><s%> themselves <S%G2523><s%> in the chair <S%G2515><s%> of Moses; <S%G3475><s%>

therefore <S%G3767><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that they tell <S%G3004><s%> you, do <S%G4160><s%> and observe, <S%G5083><s%> but do not do <S%G4160><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to their deeds; <S%G2041><s%> for they say <S%G3004><s%> [things,] and do not do <S%G4160><s%> [them.]

"And they tie <S%G1195><s%> up heavy <S%G926><s%> loads, <S%G5413><s%> and lay <S%G2007><s%> them on men's shoulders; <S%G5606><s%> but they themselves <S%G846><s%> are unwilling <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2309><s%> to move <S%G2795><s%> them with [so much as] a finger. <S%G1147><s%>

"But they do <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> their deeds <S%G2041><s%> to be noticed <S%G2300><s%> by men; <S%G444><s%> for they broaden <S%G4115><s%> their phylacteries, <S%G5440><s%> and lengthen <S%G3170><s%> the tassels <S%G2899><s%> [of their garments.]
"And they love <S%G5368><s%> the place <S%G4411><s%> of honor <S%G4411><s%> at banquets, <S%G1173><s%> and the chief <S%G4410><s%> seats <S%G4410><s%> in the synagogues, <S%G4864><s%>
and respectful greetings <S%G783><s%> in the market <S%G58><s%> places, <S%G58><s%> and being called <S%G2564><s%> by men, <S%G444><s%> Rabbi. <S%G4461><s%>
"But do not be called <S%G2564><s%> Rabbi; <S%G4461><s%> for One <S%G1520><s%> is your Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> and you are all <S%G3956><s%> brothers. <S%G80><s%>
"And do not call <S%G2564><s%> [anyone] on earth <S%G1093><s%> your father; <S%G3962><s%> for One <S%G1520><s%> is your Father, <S%G3962><s%> He who is in heaven. <S%G3770><s%>
"And do not be called <S%G2564><s%> leaders; <S%G2519><s%> for One <S%G1520><s%> is your Leader, <S%G2519><s%> [that is,] Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
"But the greatest <S%G3173><s%> among you shall be your servant. <S%G1249><s%>

"And whoever <S%G3748><s%> exalts <S%G5312><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be humbled; <S%G5013><s%> and whoever <S%G3748><s%> humbles <S%G5013><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be exalted. <S%G5312><s%>

"But woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you shut <S%G2808><s%> off the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> from men; <S%G444><s%> for you do not enter <S%G1525><s%> in yourselves, <S%G4771><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> do you allow <S%G863><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who are entering <S%G1525><s%> to go <S%G1525><s%> in.

["Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you devour <S%G2719><s%> widows' houses, <S%G3614><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> while for a pretense <S%G4392><s%> you make <S%G4336><s%> long <S%G3117><s%> prayers; <S%G4336><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> you shall receive <S%G2983><s%> greater <S%G4053><s%> condemnation. <S%G2917><s%>]

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you travel <S%G4013><s%> about <S%G4013><s%> on sea <S%G2281><s%> and land <S%G3584><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> proselyte; <S%G4339><s%> and when <S%G3752><s%> he becomes <S%G1096><s%> one, you make <S%G4160><s%> him twice <S%G1362><s%> as much <S%G1362><s%> a son <S%G5207><s%> of hell <S%G1067><s%> as yourselves. <S%G4771><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, blind <S%G5185><s%> guides, <S%G3595><s%> who say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> by the temple, <S%G3485><s%> that is nothing; <S%G3762><s%> but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> by the gold <S%G5557><s%> of the temple, <S%G3485><s%> he is obligated. <S%G3784><s%>'

"You fools <S%G3474><s%> and blind <S%G5185><s%> men; <S%G5185><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> is more <S%G3173><s%> important, <S%G3173><s%> the gold, <S%G5557><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> that sanctified <S%G37><s%> the gold <S%G5557><s%>?

"And, 'Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> by the altar, <S%G2379><s%> [that] is nothing, <S%G3762><s%> but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> by the offering <S%G1435><s%> upon it, he is obligated. <S%G3784><s%>'

"You blind <S%G5185><s%> men, <S%G5185><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> is more <S%G3173><s%> important, <S%G3173><s%> the offering <S%G1435><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%> that sanctifies <S%G37><s%> the offering <S%G1435><s%>?
"Therefore <S%G3767><s%> he who swears <S%G3660><s%> by the altar, <S%G2379><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> [both] by the altar and by everything <S%G3956><s%> on it.
"And he who swears <S%G3660><s%> by the temple, <S%G3485><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> [both] by the temple <S%G846><s%> and by Him who dwells <S%G2730><s%> within <S%G2730><s%> it.
"And he who swears <S%G3660><s%> by heaven, <S%G3772><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> [both] by the throne <S%G2362><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and by Him who sits <S%G2521><s%> upon it.

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> For you tithe <S%G586><s%> mint <S%G2238><s%> and dill <S%G432><s%> and cummin, <S%G2951><s%> and have neglected <S%G863><s%> the weightier <S%G926><s%> provisions <S%G926><s%> of the law: <S%G3551><s%> justice <S%G2920><s%> and mercy <S%G1656><s%> and faithfulness; <S%G4102><s%> but these <S%G3778><s%> are the things you should <S%G1163><s%> have done <S%G4160><s%> without <S%G3361><s%> neglecting <S%G863><s%> the others. <S%G2548><s%>
"You blind <S%G5185><s%> guides, <S%G3595><s%> who strain <S%G1368><s%> out a gnat <S%G2971><s%> and swallow <S%G2666><s%> a camel! <S%G2574><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> For you clean <S%G2511><s%> the outside <S%G1855><s%> of the cup <S%G4221><s%> and of the dish, <S%G3953><s%> but inside <S%G2081><s%> they are full <S%G1073><s%> of robbery <S%G724><s%> and self-indulgence.

"You blind <S%G5185><s%> Pharisee, <S%G5330><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> clean <S%G2511><s%> the inside <S%G1787><s%> of the cup <S%G4221><s%> and of the dish, <S%G3953><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that the outside <S%G1622><s%> of it may become <S%G1096><s%> clean <S%G2513><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> For you are like <S%G3945><s%> whitewashed <S%G2867><s%> tombs <S%G5028><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> on the outside <S%G1855><s%> appear <S%G5316><s%> beautiful, <S%G5611><s%> but inside <S%G2081><s%> they are full <S%G1073><s%> of dead <S%G3498><s%> men's bones <S%G3747><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> uncleanness. <S%G167><s%>

"Even so <S%G3779><s%> you too <S%G2532><s%> outwardly <S%G1855><s%> appear <S%G5316><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> to men, <S%G444><s%> but inwardly <S%G2081><s%> you are full <S%G3324><s%> of hypocrisy <S%G5272><s%> and lawlessness. <S%G458><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> For you build <S%G3618><s%> the tombs <S%G5028><s%> of the prophets <S%G4396><s%> and adorn <S%G2885><s%> the monuments <S%G3419><s%> of the righteous, <S%G1342><s%>

and say, <S%G3004><s%> 'If <S%G1487><s%> we had been <S%G1510><s%> [living] in the days <S%G2250><s%> of our fathers, <S%G3962><s%> we would not have been <S%G1510><s%> partners <S%G2844><s%> with them in [shedding] the blood <S%G129><s%> of the prophets. <S%G4396><s%> '

"Consequently <S%G5620><s%> you bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> against yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> that you are sons <S%G5207><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who murdered <S%G5407><s%> the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
"Fill <S%G4137><s%> up then <S%G2532><s%> the measure <S%G3358><s%> [of the guilt] of your fathers. <S%G3962><s%>
"You serpents, <S%G3789><s%> you brood <S%G1081><s%> of vipers, <S%G2191><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall you escape <S%G5343><s%> the sentence <S%G2920><s%> of hell <S%G1067><s%>?

"Therefore, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> I am sending <S%G649><s%> you prophets <S%G4396><s%> and wise <S%G4680><s%> men <S%G4680><s%> and scribes; <S%G1122><s%> some <S%G1537><s%> of them you will kill <S%G615><s%> and crucify, <S%G4717><s%> and some <S%G1537><s%> of them you will scourge <S%G3146><s%> in your synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and persecute <S%G1377><s%> from city <S%G4172><s%> to city, <S%G4172><s%>

that upon you may fall <S%G2064><s%> [the guilt of] all <S%G3956><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> shed <S%G7062><s%> on earth, <S%G1093><s%> from the blood <S%G129><s%> of righteous <S%G1342><s%> Abel to the blood <S%G6><s%> of Zechariah, <S%G129><s%> the son <S%G2197><s%> of Berechiah, <S%G5207><s%> whom <S%G914><s%> you murdered <S%G3739><s%> between <S%G5407><s%> the temple <S%G3342><s%> and the altar. <S%G3485><s%>
"Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> shall come <S%G2240><s%> upon this <S%G3778><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>

"O Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> who kills <S%G615><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> and stones <S%G3036><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who are sent <S%G649><s%> to her! How <S%G4212><s%> often <S%G4212><s%> I wanted <S%G2309><s%> to gather <S%G1996><s%> your children <S%G5043><s%> together, <S%G1996><s%> the way <S%G5158><s%> a hen <S%G3733><s%> gathers <S%G1996><s%> her chicks <S%G3556><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> her wings, <S%G4420><s%> and you were unwilling. <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2309><s%>
"Behold, <S%G2400><s%> your house <S%G3624><s%> is being left <S%G863><s%> to you desolate! <S%G2048><s%>

"For I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, from now <S%G737><s%> on you shall not see <S%G3708><s%> Me until <S%G2193><s%> you say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is He who comes <S%G2064><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord! <S%G2962><s%>'"
